articles.content: Alia Bhatt starrer Gangubai Kathiawadi released recently and the actress is being praised a lot for her performance. However, there were many celebs who were approached to do the film but they refuse… [+106 chars]

articles.title: Aretha Franklin's granddaughter auditions for American Idol - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 15-year-old performed Killing Me Softly With His Song and her grandmother's song, Ain't No Way, but still failed to persuade judges Lionel Richie and Luke Bryan.
